title: \*\*\*TRADING\*\*\* some fonts
content: Not sure this has been discussed in the forums or not. Most of the fonts license is about 1–5 users, I’d be willing to trade the most recent fonts I have with CHELTENHAM OLD STYLE NO. 2 by URW. Any formats but don’t postscript.
author: anthlei

comments.content: Great plan, except most font licenses say five CPU's at _one location_ - so unless you're looking for four roommates... What's Sacramento like this time of year? ;-)

Yeah, if you're willing to move to Downtown Portland, I'll have Kievit, Tribute and Costa welcome you.

Just kidding, just kidding :)
